sections.title: 1 cup water
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup water
o
1/2 cup butter
o
1 cup flour
o
3 eggs
o
1/4 cup sugar
o
1 teaspoon cinnamon
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Bring water and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Bring water and butter to a boil.
o
Add flour and stir until a dough forms.
o
Remove from heat and beat in eggs one at a time.
o
Heat oil in a pan.
o
Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and roll in a mixture of sugar and cinnamon.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Bring water and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup rice
o
1 cup coconut milk
o
1 cup water
o
1/4 cup shredded coconut
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Saute shredded coconut
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute shredded coconut until lightly browned.
o
Add rice, coconut milk, water, and salt.
o
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute shredded coconut
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 small cabbage
o
2 carrots
o
1/2 cup mayonnaise
o
2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Shred cabbage and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Shred cabbage and grate carrots.
o
Mix mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, and salt in a bowl.
o
Toss cabbage and carrots with dressing.
o
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

sections.title: Shred cabbage and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup cornmeal
o
1 cup flour
o
1/4 cup sugar
o
1 tablespoon baking powder
o
1/2 teaspoon salt
o
1 cup milk
o
1/4 cup vegetable oil
o
1 egg
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 400degF (200degC).
o
Mix cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o
Add milk, oil, and beaten egg, stir until combined.
o
Pour batter into a greased baking pan.
o
Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden.
o
Serve warm.
Coxinha
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups shredded chicken
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1/4 cup cream cheese
o
1 cup flour
o
1 cup breadcrumbs
o
2 eggs
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o
Mix shredded chicken with onion, garlic, chopped parsley, and cream cheese.
o
Form mixture into drumstick shapes.
o
Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
8 slices bread
o
4 slices ham
o
1 cup grated Gruyere cheese
o
1/4 cup bechamel sauce

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 400degF (200degC).
o
Spread bechamel sauce on 4 slices of bread.
o
Top with ham and grated cheese, then cover with remaining bread slices.
o
Melt butter in a pan and toast sandwiches until golden.
o
Transfer to a baking sheet, top with more bechamel sauce and cheese.
o
Bake for 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1/2 cup butter
o
1/2 cup flour
o
2 cups milk
o
1/2 cup ham
o
1/4 cup grated cheese
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
o
1 cup breadcrumbs
o
2 eggs
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Melt butter in a
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Melt butter in a saucepan, stir in flour to make a roux.
o
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.
o
Stir in diced ham, grated cheese, salt, and nutmeg.
o
Let mixture cool, then form into croquettes.
o
Dredge croquettes in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Melt butter in a
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup lentils
o
4 cups water
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon turmeric
o
1 teaspoon coriander
o
1 teaspoon garam masala
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
2 tablespoons oil
*

sections.title: Melt butter in a
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
6 eggs
o
1/4 cup mayonnaise
o
1 tablespoon mustard
o
1 tablespoon vinegar
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon paprika
*

sections.title: Hard boil eggs then
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Hard-boil eggs, then peel and halve.
o
Remove yolks and mash with mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, and salt.
o
Spoon or pipe yolk mixture into egg whites.
o
Sprinkle with paprika and serve.
Dolmas
*

sections.title: Hard boil eggs then
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 jar grape leaves
o
1 cup rice
o
1 small onion
o
1/4 cup pine nuts
o
1/4 cup currants
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Rinse grape leaves
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Rinse grape leaves and pat dry.
o
Saute diced onion in olive oil until translucent.
o
Add rice, pine nuts, and currants, cook for 5 minutes.
o
Add 1 cup water, lemon juice, and salt, simmer until rice is tender.
o
Place a spoonful of rice mixture on each grape leaf and roll tightly.
o
Arrange dolmas in a pot, cover with water, and simmer for 30 minutes.
o
Serve warm or chilled.

sections.title: Rinse grape leaves
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 package dumpling wrappers
o
1/2 pound ground pork

sections.title: Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
oil in a bowl.
o
Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden, then steam for 5 minutes.
o
Serve with dipping sauce.
Edamame
*

sections.title: Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound edamame (soybeans in pods)
o
1 tablespoon sea salt
*

sections.title: Steam or boil edamame
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Steam or boil edamame until tender (about 5 minutes).
o
Drain and sprinkle with sea salt.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Steam or boil edamame
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup ground egusi seeds
o
1/2 pound beef
o
1/2 pound fish
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 tomatoes
o
1/4 cup palm oil
o
1 teaspoon crayfish powder
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
o
4 cups water
o
1/4 cup spinach
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in palm oil until softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes, ground egusi seeds, and crayfish powder, cook for 5
minutes.
o
Add beef, fish, salt, pepper, and water, simmer until meat is tender.
o
Stir in chopped spinach and cook for 5 minutes.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 package egg roll wrappers
o
1 cup shredded cabbage
o
1/2 cup grated carrots
o
1/2 cup bean sprouts
o
1/4 cup chopped green onions
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon sesame oil
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix cabbage, carrots, bean sprouts, green onions, soy sauce, and sesame oil in a
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix cabbage, carrots, bean sprouts, green onions, soy sauce, and sesame oil in a
bowl.
o
Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.
Elote
*

sections.title: Mix cabbage, carrots, bean sprouts, green onions, soy sauce, and sesame oil in a
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 ears of corn
o
1/4 cup mayonnaise
o
1/4 cup sour cream
o
1/2 cup cotija cheese
o
1 teaspoon chili powder
o
1 lime
*

sections.title: Grill the corn until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Grill the corn until charred.
o
Mix mayonnaise and sour cream in a bowl.
o
Brush the mixture onto the corn.
o
Sprinkle with cotija cheese and chili powder.
o
Squeeze lime juice over the top and serve.

sections.title: Grill the corn until
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1/2 cup butter
o
1/4 cup water
o
1 egg
o
1/2 pound ground beef
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olives
o
1/4 cup raisins
o
1 teaspoon cumin

sections.title: Mix flour butter
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest.
o
Saute ground beef, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped olives, and raisins with
cumin, paprika, and salt until cooked.
o
Roll out dough and cut into circles.
o
Place a spoonful of filling on each circle and fold to seal.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Mix flour butter
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 eggplants
o
2 bell peppers
o
2 tomatoes
o
1 small onion
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 400degF (200degC).
o
Roast eggplants, bell peppers, tomatoes, and onion until tender.
o
Peel and slice vegetables.
o
Arrange on a plate and drizzle with olive oil.
o
Sprinkle with salt and serve warm or at room temperature.
Falafel
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 can chickpeas
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon coriander
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup flour
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Drain and rinse
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Drain and rinse chickpeas.
o
Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander,
and salt in a food processor.
o
Add flour and mix until combined.
o
Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.

sections.title: Drain and rinse
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cassava flour
o
1/4 cup butter
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup bacon
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Saute diced bacon
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy.
o
Add cassava flour and cook, stirring constantly, until golden.
o
Stir in chopped parsley and salt.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced bacon
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 pita breads
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 cucumber
o
1 small red onion
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1/4 cup mint
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon sumac
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Toast pita breads
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Toast pita breads until crispy, then break into pieces.
o
Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o
Mix vegetables with chopped parsley and mint.
o
Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, sumac, and salt, then pour over salad.
o
Toss well and serve.
Fava
*

sections.title: Toast pita breads
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup yellow split peas
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: Rinse split peas
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Rinse split peas and cook in water until tender.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o
Blend cooked peas with onion, garlic, lemon juice, and salt until smooth.
o
Serve warm or chilled.

sections.title: Rinse split peas
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cooked beans
o
1/4 cup bacon
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup cassava flour
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Saute diced bacon
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic until crispy.
o
Add cooked beans and cassava flour, stir to combine.
o
Stir in chopped parsley and salt.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced bacon
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1/4 cup cornmeal
o
1/4 cup sugar
o
1 tablespoon baking powder
o
1/2 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup milk
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix flour cornmeal
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o
Add milk and stir until dough forms.
o
Roll out dough and cut into strips.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Mix flour cornmeal
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o
1 teaspoon sugar
o
1 cup warm water
o
2 1/2 cups flour
o
1 teaspoon salt

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o
Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil.
o
Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o
Press dough into a baking pan, dimple with fingers, and sprinkle with rosemary
and sea salt.
o
Bake at 400degF (200degC) for 20-25 minutes until golden.

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup freekeh
o
2 cups water
o
1 small onion
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1/4 cup mint
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Rinse freekeh and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Rinse freekeh and cook in water until tender, then drain.
o
Saute diced onion in olive oil until softened.
o
Mix freekeh with sauteed onion, chopped parsley, and mint.
o
Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, and salt, then pour over salad.
o
Toss well and serve.

sections.title: Rinse freekeh and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 ripe plantains
o
1 cup vegetable oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Peel and slice plantains
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and slice plantains.
o
Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Peel and slice plantains
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cooked rice
o
1 small onion
o
1/2 cup peas

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion, peas, and carrots in sesame oil until softened.
o
Push vegetables to the side and scramble eggs in the same pan.
o
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, stir to combine.
o
Cook until heated through.
o
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.
Fufu
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cassava flour
o
4 cups water
*

sections.title: Bring water to a
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Bring water to a boil.
o
Gradually add cassava flour, stirring constantly until thickened.
o
Continue to cook, stirring, until smooth and elastic.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Bring water to a
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
1/4 cup soy sauce
o
2 tablespoons sugar
o
1 tablespoon sesame oil
o
1/4 cup water
o
1 tablespoon sesame seeds
*

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and dice potatoes.
o
Saute potatoes in sesame oil until lightly browned.
o
Add soy sauce, sugar, and water, simmer until potatoes are tender.
o
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve warm.

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 baguette
o
1/2 cup butter
o
4 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 cucumber
o
1 small red onion
o
1 bell pepper
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Dice tomatoes cucumber
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper.
o
Blend vegetables with minced garlic, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper until
smooth.
o
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

sections.title: Dice tomatoes cucumber
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups giant beans
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 tomatoes
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon oregano
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Soak beans overnight
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes, oregano, salt, and pepper, simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Mix beans with tomato sauce and transfer to a baking dish.
o
Bake at 375degF (190degC) for 30 minutes.
o
Serve warm.
Goi Cuon (Spring Rolls)
*

sections.title: Cook shrimp and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cook shrimp and slice in half.
o
Cook rice vermicelli according to package instructions, then drain.
o
Soak rice paper wrappers in warm water until pliable.
o
Place a small amount of shrimp, vermicelli, lettuce, mint, cilantro, basil, julienned
carrots, and cucumber on each wrapper.
o
Roll tightly and serve with dipping sauce.
Gomae (Spinach with Sesame Dressing)
*

sections.title: Cook shrimp and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 bunch spinach
o
2 tablespoons sesame seeds
o
1 tablespoon soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 tablespoon mirin
*

sections.title: Blanch spinach in boiling water, then rinse in cold water and squeeze out excess
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Blanch spinach in boiling water, then rinse in cold water and squeeze out excess
moisture.
o
Toast sesame seeds and grind them.
o
Mix sesame seeds with soy sauce, sugar, and mirin.
o
Toss spinach with dressing and serve.

sections.title: Blanch spinach in boiling water, then rinse in cold water and squeeze out excess
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
1 cup heavy cream
o
1/2 cup milk
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/2 cup grated Gruyere cheese
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 375degF (190degC).
o
Peel and thinly slice potatoes.
o
Rub a baking dish with a cut clove of garlic.

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 cucumber
o
1 small red onion
o
1/4 cup olives
o
1/4 cup feta cheese
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o
1 teaspoon oregano
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Dice tomatoes and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o
Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese.
o
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, and salt, then pour over salad.
o
Toss well and serve.

sections.title: Green Bean Casserole
sections.context:
Green Bean Casserole
*

sections.title: Green Bean Casserole
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 cups green beans
o
1 can cream of mushroom soup
o
1/2 cup milk
o
1 cup fried onions
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 350degF (175degC).
o
Cook green beans until tender.
o
Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.
o
Add green beans and half of the fried onions, stir to combine.
o
Bake for 25 minutes.
o
Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
3 avocados
o
1 lime

sections.title: Cut avocados in
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.
o
Mash the avocados with a fork.
o
Add lime juice, diced onion, chopped tomatoes, salt, cilantro, and garlic.
o
Mix well and serve immediately.
Gurkensalat (Cucumber Salad)
*

sections.title: Cut avocados in
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cucumbers
o
1/4 cup sour cream
o
2 tablespoons vinegar
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 teaspoon dill
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Slice cucumbers
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Slice cucumbers thinly.
o
Mix sour cream, vinegar, sugar, dill, and salt in a bowl.
o
Toss cucumbers with the dressing.
o
Serve chilled.

sections.title: Slice cucumbers
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 eggs
o
1 cup water
o
1/4 cup green onions
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon sesame oil
*

sections.title: Beat eggs with water
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions.
o
Pour mixture into a heatproof bowl.
o
Steam for 10-15 minutes until set.
o
Drizzle with sesame oil and serve warm.
Harira
*

sections.title: Beat eggs with water
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup lentils
o
1/2 cup chickpeas
o
1 small onion
